activities: Onavo Inc. receives customer data related to the provision of the Onavo suite of mobile applications, as well as other products and services of Onavo or its affiliates (such as but not limited to Facebook Inc. and Facebook Ireland).  Onavo Inc. may access and process mobile data traffic and personally identifying information provided by users, affiliates, service providers or other corporate business partners.  Onavo Inc. may use personally identifying information that it receives to provide and operate the Onavo applications and other services; to send updates and notices and to provide users with information related to the services; to engage in market analytics or other research activities; to provide services to Facebook Ireland Ltd and other affiliates or entities, such as advertisers and partners; and for other activities as set out in the Onavo Privacy Policy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
